content: Exposures to corporates. Exposures to corporates shall be assigned a risk weight as follows: (a) 100% risk weight for unrated exposures; (b) 20% to 150% for rated exposures based on credit quality step.

Exposures secured by mortgages on residential property. Exposures fully and completely secured by mortgages on residential property that is or will be occupied by the owner shall be assigned a 35% risk weight.

Exposures to central governments or central banks. Exposures to central governments and central banks shall be assigned a risk weight as follows: credit quality step 1: 0%, step 2: 20%, step 3: 50%, step 4-6: 100%, step 7-8: 150%.
Exposures secured by mortgages on commercial immovable property. Exposures fully and completely secured by mortgages on offices or other commercial premises shall be assigned a 100% risk weight.

Exposures to institutions. Exposures to institutions shall be assigned a risk weight based on the credit quality step of the institution: credit quality step 1: 20%, step 2: 50%, step 3: 100%, step 4-6: 100%, step 7-8: 150%.
